title: [AssemblyProgramCraftMOD]成功实现编译汇编程序，并保存成文件，并载入
author: yuxuanchiadm
txt_content:
更多详细信息：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-56284-1-1.html

使用的程序代码：
ProgramPackage pak = ProgramPackageFileSystem.ReadFileToProgramPackage(ProgramPackageFileSystem.WriteProgramPackageToFile(Assembler.Compiled("SET PC,3", 0, false, "test"),"/asmv32"));
System.out.println(pak.ProgramName);
System.out.println(pak.ProgramEnd);
System.out.println(pak.StaticRAMEnd);
System.out.println(pak.IsBIOS);
System.out.println(pak.StartRAM);
System.out.println(UnsignedTools.read16RadixUINTValue(pak.bytes[0],true));
System.out.println(UnsignedTools.read16RadixUINTValue(pak.bytes[1],true));
System.out.println(UnsignedTools.read16RadixUINTValue(pak.bytes[2],true));复制代码
输出：

[13:49:46] 2012-11-11 13:49:46 [INFO] [STDOUT] 加载AssemblyProgramCraft（1.0.0）中
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:46 [INFO] [STDOUT] SET PC,3
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]操作符：SET
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]参数1：PC
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]参数1类型：Registers
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]参数2：3
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]参数2类型：Number10Radix
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]写入数据：0x2c000001(101100000000000000000000000001)
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]写入数据：0xa(1010)
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] [AssemblerInfo]写入数据：0x3(11)
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] test
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] 2
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] 2
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] false
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] 0
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] 2c000001
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] 0000000a
[13:49:47] 2012-11-11 13:49:47 [INFO] [STDOUT] 00000003
